member.summary: Merges multiple lists of fields into a single list, combining all elements while ignoring null lists.

member.name: M:BoldBi.Ai.Base.Helpers.FieldBuilder.GenerateFilterFieldsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.List{BoldBi.Ai.Core.Models.VisualCreation.Transform})
member.summary: Asynchronously generates BI (Business Intelligence) filter fields by processing a list of transformations.
member.param: A list of objects representing the transformations to be processed for generating BI fields. Each transformation contributes to the resulting list of fields.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a object with the generated fields populated based on the provided transformations.

member.name: M:BoldBi.Ai.Base.Helpers.FieldBuilder.GenerateTransformFieldsAsync(BoldBi.Ai.Core.Models.VisualCreation.Transform)
member.summary: Asynchronously generates BI (Business Intelligence) transform fields based on the specified transformation filter.
member.param: A object representing the transformation filter. This includes filter and window-related data used to generate BI fields.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a object with the generated fields based on the provided transformation.
member.remarks:
This method utilizes helper methods to process filters and rank fields:
processes filter-based transformations.
processes rank-based transformations (window operations).
The fields from both operations are merged using .

member.name: M:BoldBi.Ai.Base.Helpers.FieldBuilder.AddTransformFilterFieldsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.List{BoldBi.Ai.Core.Models.VisualCreation.Filters})
member.summary: Asynchronously generates a list of BI (Business Intelligence) fields based on the provided list of filters.
member.param: A list of objects representing the filters to be transformed into BI fields. Each filter contributes metadata such as column name, aggregate type, time unit, and additional filter information.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a list of objects populated based on the provided filters. If the input is null, the task returns null.
member.remarks:
For each filter in the input:
A primary field is created based on the filter's column name and metadata.
If the filter includes a relative date filter with a different date column, an additional field is created.
These fields are marked as filter columns and include metadata for internal processing.

member.name: M:BoldBi.Ai.Base.Helpers.FieldBuilder.AddTransformRankFieldsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.List{BoldBi.Ai.Core.Models.VisualCreation.Rank})
member.summary: Asynchronously generates a list of BI (Business Intelligence) fields based on the provided rank filters.
member.param: A list of objects representing the rank-based transformations used to generate BI fields. Each rank filter contributes group-by fields and associated metadata.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a list of objects populated based on the rank filters. If the input is null, the task returns an empty list.
member.remarks:
For each rank filter in the input:
A field is created for each encoding field in the filter's group-by list.
The field metadata includes properties such as name, display name, date/time format, and rank filter info.
These fields are marked as filter columns and invisible by default.

member.name: M:BoldBi.Ai.Base.Helpers.FieldBuilder.UpdateUniqueColumnName(System.Collections.Generic.List{BoldBi.Ai.Core.Models.AIOutputPreparation.Field})
member.summary: Updates the unique column names for a list of BI (Business Intelligence) fields by assigning a sequential identifier to each field.
member.param: A list of objects to be updated with unique column names.
member.returns: The updated list of objects with unique column names assigned.
member.remarks: This method iterates through the list of fields and assigns a unique column name in the format "columnX", where X is a sequential number starting from 1.
